Output ```console > pip install --upgrade --ignore-installed tensorflow-gpu==1.5 Collecting tensorflow-gpu==1.5 Downloading tensorflow_gpu-1.5.0-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl (82.1MB) Collecting
